topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f5f4fc636872480a580000#post_54f5f4fc636872480a580000
[bq="ParagonCommander"]So, you remember Zeenistrad? A user who was once on here but now uses tumblr?
Apparently, some users of this site didn't see the problem with CP being posted on 8chan.
If what he says his true, then I've suddenly lost all respect for those people and this site in general.[/bq]
That's not what happened; it has to do with the gamergate drama.

Tl:dr version;
Zenni is a sjw; he tried to rank up in the sjw clique by shoving all of derpibooru under the bus; sjw don't currently give a shit about bronies cause they're occupied with gamers beating the metaphorical crap out of them; Zenni got angry cause no one was paying him attention.

That's the problem with sjw is that it's not a movement; it's a high school popularity contest and in order to be the most popular person you have to be "oppressed" the most, but cause Zenni is a straight white male he therefore according to sjw manifesto is nothing more than a tool.
